gwt.g3d.client.texture
Class AbstractTexture

java.lang.Object
  gwt.g3d.client.texture.AbstractTexture
All Implemented Interfaces:
GLDisposable, Texture
Direct Known Subclasses:
Texture2D
public abstract class AbstractTexture
extends java.lang.Object
implements Texture

Represents an abstract Texture.

Author:
hao1300@gmail.com

init

public void init(GL2 gl)
Description copied from interface: Texture
Initializes this texture. This method must be called before accessing any method in this texture. If a texture is disposed, it can be used again when init is called.

Specified by:
init in interface Texture
